title.rendered: Why Luxe is the Best Hairdresser in Chatswood!

content.rendered:
Looking for the best hairdresser in Chatswood? Look no further! 

Need a little convincing? We have put together eleven reasons why you should try us out;

  1. We love what we do, and it shows:  Being the biggest and busiest salon on the North Shore of Sydney only comes from a love what we do – a happy, creative vibe fills our salon, and we hope you feel is too.
  2. Our team is highly trained: With an array of stylists for all clientele, we offer male, female, younger, older, locally trained, European trained, precision cutters AND colour specialists – we have all your bases covered. Our team are all incredibly friendly and warm, so your Luxe experience is sure to exceed all your expectations!  Speak to one of our front desk team to match you up with a stylist that could best service you!
  3. It’s Good to talk. Undecided on what to do with your hair? We offer complimentary consultations: Let’s get to know each other! At your initial consult, we will discuss your hair, potential styles, colour and your budget so you feel safe with your chosen style or service. These are essential for new colour clients. Check out our FAQ’s for any questions you may have on colour
  4. We are full service salon and our expertise caters to everyone’s hair needs. Whether it be precision cutting, creative styling, balayage specialists and colouring experts, barbering, or relaxing treatments. Plus, for an extra special treat, try our Luxe Experience Packages where we bundle our most popular colour services
  5. Your happiness is our priority: At Luxe we offer a 14-day guarantee on our work. In the unlikely event you not completely happy with your new look, we will happily adjust your hair to your satisfaction
  6. Education is key. At Luxe, we are constantly updating our skills and techniques. Intensive ongoing training with leading industry names ensures our team are always up to date with modern hairdressing skills, as well as working together to share and develop new ideas and techniques
  7. Our location: Positioned in the designer centre that is Chatswood Chase, Luxe sits alongside some of the worlds’ most exclusive brands
  8. We are down to earth and fun: We keep things real and you will feel special, but in a long-lost friend kind of way! Check out our reviews to see what our clients say
  9. We use only the best products: Kerastase, Oribe, Davines, Olaplex and many others. Our stylists know these brands well, and will take the time to explain what is best for your hair.  We also curate Luxe Hair Concepts – a leading hair resource destination
  10. Our work speaks for itself – Check out our Instagram Feed for some real life inspiration
  11. Brand new clients get a discount:  Simply download the voucher on this page and present it when you arrive for your appointment (terms and conditions do apply – feel free to chat to us about these when you book).

So now you know what we have to offer, don’t just take our word for it.  Check out what our regular’s say, and call us for a chat.  We look forward to welcoming you at Luxe – the best hairdresser in Chatswood!!
